example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 不料)) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (NP-TMP (NT 下午)) (PP-LOC (P 在) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (NP-PRD (NP (NP-PN (NR 鹅銮鼻)) (NP (NN 东方))) (QP (ADVP (AD 约)) (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 公里)))) (NP (NN 海域)))))) (NP (NN 处)))) (VP (VV 搁浅))))
